name: NSToolbar.SizeMode
desc: These constants specify toolbar display modes and are used by the sizeMode property.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The toolbar uses the system-defined default size, which is NSToolbarSizeModeRegular.

items.name: case regular
items.desc: The toolbar uses regular-sized controls and 32 by 32 pixel icons.

items.name: case small
items.desc: The toolbar uses small-sized controls and 24 by 24 pixel icons.
